subject: fix: use themed text color for tag distribution pie chart legend
body:
The doughnut chart's generateLabels callback didn't set fontColor, so
Chart.js fell back to using each slice's background color as legend text
color (e.g. green text for "feature"). Now explicitly sets fontColor
from --text-secondary CSS variable for readable legend text.
